instructions: Build the Production ML Architecture! Drag each component to its correct layer in the end-to-end machine learning pipeline — from feature engineering to real-time inference and monitoring.
learnings: Feature Store: Databricks Feature Store provides centralized feature tables with point-in-time lookups, ensuring training/serving consistency and eliminating training-serving skew.
Model Training: MLflow Tracking logs experiments, parameters, metrics, and artifacts. AutoML and distributed training accelerate iteration cycles.
Model Registry (Unity Catalog): Models are registered as UC assets with stage transitions (None → Staging → Production), lineage tracking, and access controls.
Model Serving Endpoints: Serverless real-time endpoints with Champion/Challenger routing enable A/B testing and canary deployments with automatic scaling.
Drift Monitoring: Lakehouse Monitoring tracks feature drift, prediction drift, and data quality. Alerts trigger retraining pipelines when metrics breach thresholds.
